thread.title: Former nursing home employee accused of 'bad things... sexual things'
thread.title_full: Former nursing home employee accused of 'bad things... sexual things'

title: Former nursing home employee accused of 'bad things... sexual things'
text:
Published By: Indy Star - Today 
An arrest warrant has been issued for 20-year-old man who is accused of exposing himself to residents and forcing some of them to touch him....
